Index: =================================================================== --- +++ @@ -102,12 +102,103 @@ + +
+
+
+

About Tech Bazzar

+

Your Trusted Partner in Pre-Owned Electronics

+
+ +
+
+
+

Our Story

+

Founded with a vision to make quality technology accessible to everyone, Tech Bazzar has become a leading platform for buying and selling pre-owned electronics in Sudan. We believe that everyone deserves access to reliable technology without breaking the bank.

+
+ +
+

Our Mission

+

To provide a trusted marketplace where customers can find high-quality used electronics with complete transparency, fair pricing, and exceptional customer service. We're committed to sustainability by giving devices a second life.

+
+ +
+

Our Values

+
+
+ +

Trust & Transparency

+

Every device is thoroughly tested and comes with detailed condition reports.

+
+
+ +

Value for Money

+

Quality products at prices that make sense for your budget.

+
+
+ +

Customer First

+

We're here to help you find the perfect device for your needs.

+
+
+ +

Sustainability

+

Reducing e-waste by extending the life of electronics.

+
+
+
+
+ +
+
+ 5000+ + Happy Customers +
+
+ 2000+ + Devices Sold +
+
+ 98% + Satisfaction Rate +
+
+ 3 + Years of Trust +
+
+
+ +
+

Why Choose Tech Bazzar?

+
+
+ + Rigorous Quality Testing +
+
+ + 6-Month Warranty on All Devices +
+
+ + Free Delivery in Khartoum +
+
+ + Easy Return Policy +
+
+
+
+
+

About Tech Bazzar

+

Your Trusted Partner in Pre-Owned Electronics

+
+ +
+
+
+

Our Story

+

Founded with a vision to make quality technology accessible to everyone, Tech Bazzar has become a leading platform for buying and selling pre-owned electronics in Sudan. We believe that everyone deserves access to reliable technology without breaking the bank.

+
+ +
+

Our Mission

+

To provide a trusted marketplace where customers can find high-quality used electronics with complete transparency, fair pricing, and exceptional customer service. We're committed to sustainability by giving devices a second life.

+
+ +
+

Our Values

+
+
+ +

Trust & Transparency

+

Every device is thoroughly tested and comes with detailed condition reports.

+
+
+ +

Value for Money

+

Quality products at prices that make sense for your budget.

+
+
+ +

Customer First

+

We're here to help you find the perfect device for your needs.

+
+
+ +

Sustainability

+

Reducing e-waste by extending the life of electronics.

+
+
+
+
+ +
+
+ 5000+ + Happy Customers +
+
+ 2000+ + Devices Sold +
+
+ 98% + Satisfaction Rate +
+
+ 3 + Years of Trust +
+
+
+ +
+

Why Choose Tech Bazzar?

+
+
+ + Rigorous Quality Testing +
+
+ + 6-Month Warranty on All Devices +
+
+ + Free Delivery in Khartoum +
+
+ + Easy Return Policy +
+
+
+
+
+ + + + +
+
+
+

+

We're here to help you with any questions about our products or services
